mapper.select: select max(t.f_war_code) as warCode from t_base_warehouseinfo t where t.f_war_code REGEXP '^C[0-9]{9}'

SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}

SELECT * FROM t_base_warehouseinfo WHERE f_war_type_id in ('01','10') AND f_status = '2' AND (f_war_code like CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR f_war_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR #{keyword}='')
